samples.question: Is it more difficult for old people to accept new technologies?
samples.transcript: Yes. old people often face more challenges accepting and adapting to new technologies instead of younger people because they are not familiar with the digital devices. They may struggle with using smartphone, online banking and smart home appliances. but with proper guidance and userfriendly interface they can become they can gradually become comfortable with it. Yes. Okay.
